title: But why
body: Why can't players play 5 man flexed if someone is in gold and anothe rperson is in bronze??? What's the point to this if they're all partied together

replies.body:
Because the MMR difference would make it very hard for matchmaking to find an equivalent team, especially when you throw positions into the mix. The Gold player would be smashing Bronzes, or the Bronze would get smashed by Golds. It's not a balanced or even close to equal team on either side and that's just not fair in a competitive environment.

If you want to carry the Bronze up, that's not how ranked is supposed to work. If you just want to play in a premade for fun, that's what normals are for.
